name: Konstantinos Karamanis
goal:
I am a member of the Enterprise Europe Network, the Commission’s official business support Network and the world’s largest of this kind.
http://een.ec.europa.eu/
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives: The present participation to the transparency register is due to my mandate as Sector Chair of the Enterprise Europe Network. We steer and coordinate the actions of our Sector Group, an Enterprise Europe Network internal group aiming at helping SMEs to develop internationally in a structured way.
customers: Executive Agency for Small and Medium Enterprises
